cp510.assignments.assignment9

Class ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • cp510.assignments.assignment9.ChessPiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    The ChessPiece class for the chess project. This abstract class is the root class of all chess pieces.
    Author:
    Toby Peterson.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChessPiece

        public ChessPiece(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String imagePath,
                  ChessColor color)
        The 3-parameter constructor for Chess Piece. When invoking this constructor, the imagePath is the empty string, the color will be one of ChessColor.BLACK or ChessColor.WHITE, and the name will be the name of the chess piece.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this chess piece.
        imagePath - The path to the file containing the image for this chess piece. For this assignment, it returns an empty string.
        color - The color of this chess piece.

    • Method Detail

      • getValidMoves

        public abstract java.util.List<ChessPoint> getValidMoves(ChessPieceMap chessMap)
        The abstract method getValidMoves. It returns a list of all valid moves for this chess piece given the state of the chess board. Note: all ChessPiece subclasses except Bishop and Rook should return an empty list.
        Parameters:
        chessMap - The current state of the chess board.
        Returns:
        A list of all valid moves for this chess piece.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        The getName getter for the name property.
        Returns:
        The value of the name property.

      • getImage

        public java.awt.Image getImage()
        The getImage getter for the image property. Note:for this assignment this method should return null.
        Returns:
        The value of the image property.

      • getColor

        public ChessColor getColor()
        The getter for this chess piece's color.
        Returns:
        ChessColor The color of the chess piece.

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        The getter for the isAlive property.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if this piece has not been captured.

      • setAlive

        public void setAlive(boolean alive)
        The setter for the isAlive property.
        Parameters:
        alive - The boolean that determines if this piece is alive or not.
